about_the_game:
• Premium Sound & Data Pack
*Includes 31 anime themes and soundtracks, 15 original songs, and 54 reference images.
*Songs will be game-sized cuts.

[Song List]
Com Battler V No Theme
Tobe! GUNDAM
Ai Senshi
Sassoutaru Char
Mobile Suit Sen -Kosen-
Beyond The Time ~Möbius no Sora wo Koete~
STAND UP TO THE VICTORY
Don't Stop! Carry On!
Vigilante
narrative
L-GAIM -Time for L-GAIM-
Kaze no No Reply
HEART TO HEART
Yusyaou Tanjo! -Mythology Version-
Yusyaou Tanjo! -Juvenile Version-
Chin -requiem-juvenile- Togi
Revive
HEATS
Can’t Stop
MAZINGER Z (INFINITY Version)
Ore wa Great Mazinger
Mazinkaiser
Yuzurenai Negai
Hikari to Kage wo Dakishimeta Mama
GUN×SWORD
El Dorado V
Watashi wa Souzou Suru
PROMPT
Hello! My World!!
UNION
Yume no Hero
ZEUTH
ZEXIS
Z-BLUE
Amakakeyo Senshi tachi
ExCross
Tora no O o Fume!
ANGER INVERSION
Raise the anchor!
With All Might
Shori to Asu o Kasanete
MAXIMUM BREAK!!
VARIABLE FORMATION
EVERYWHERE YOU GO
Ai to Kiseki no "Umasugi WAVE"
Concerto of SRW

• Premium Sound & Data Pack Special Mission
※ Rewards the Topological Sight Power Part, 100,000 credits, 1,000 PP, and 5,000 MxP.

*This content is also included in the Digital Ultimate Edition, which includes the full game, Season Pass, Bonus Mission Pack, and Premium Sound and Data Pack. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 320, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6670, 1 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 | AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9800 GTX, 512 MB | AMD Radeon HD 4870, 512 MB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: This is a set of 31 anime themes and soundtracks, 15 original songs, and 54 reference images. *Songs will be game-sized cuts.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
